lead_paragraph: Dr. Smigel, who founded the American Society for Dental Aesthetics, built on processes used for laser whitening and bonding to improve the appearance of teeth.

headline.print_headline: Irwin Smigel, 92, a Dentist  Behind Cosmetic Techniques
headline.main: Irwin Smigel, New York Dentist Behind Cosmetic Techniques, Dies at 92

snippet: Dr. Smigel, who founded the American Society for Dental Aesthetics, built on processes used for laser whitening and bonding to improve the appearance of teeth....
abstract: Irwin Smigel, whose aesthetic dentistry practice advanced techniques in bonding and laser whitening for countless patients and celebrity clientele, dies at age 92.
